Body: Possible Duplicate:  What does "to root a phone" mean?  How to take a screenshot with an Android phone?  I have android gingerbread. I wanted screen shots of my menu screen, so I downloaded the application from the android store,but every application wants a root access. How can I login as root so that I am able to take the screen shots just by shaking the phone?
Title: How can I log in as root to take the screen shot?

history.Text: I have android gingerbread . I wanted screen shots of my menu screen,so i downloaded the application from the android store,but every application wants a root access. How can i login as root so that i am able to take the screen shots just by shaking the phone ?
logging in as root to take the screen shot
